alert.note: Alert for Gregg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:21PM CST until January 19 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON...NORTH CENTRAL PANOLA...NORTHEASTERN RUSK AND CENTRAL GREGG COUNTIES... At 420 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Longview, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Longview, Marshall, Hallsville, Lakeport, Easton, Nesbitt, Darco and Judson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
